4c8f1cb8-59e0-4bca-9757-4fc39c0e5305.title: Big Plane tree has fallen
4c8f1cb8-59e0-4bca-9757-4fc39c0e5305.description: This morning, I noticed a large tree has fallen on Vasil Petrovich street. It's blocking part of the road, making it difficult for vehicles to pass and posing a safety hazard. This needs to be cleared as soon as possible to ensure safe passage for everyone.
4c8f1cb8-59e0-4bca-9757-4fc39c0e5305.author: chris_wood

4712766c-85d7-4a06-a988-ef619b9163cd.title: Dangerous parking
4712766c-85d7-4a06-a988-ef619b9163cd.description: A car is parked right on the corner in front of the grocery store. The visibility is extremely low, making it dangerous for other drivers and pedestrians. This needs to be addressed quickly to prevent any potential accidents.
4712766c-85d7-4a06-a988-ef619b9163cd.author: pesho

90446eff-c420-4a7a-bb6a-7123bc06dfe3.title: Broken swing set
90446eff-c420-4a7a-bb6a-7123bc06dfe3.description: This morning, I noticed that the swing set at the children's playground is broken. One of the chains is completely detached, making it unsafe for kids to use. This needs to be fixed as soon as possible to ensure the safety of the children playing there.
90446eff-c420-4a7a-bb6a-7123bc06dfe3.location: The playground next to the post office
90446eff-c420-4a7a-bb6a-7123bc06dfe3.author: mata_hari

8da40a27-94a3-4624-98a7-4266a9b8e142.title: Illegal dumping
8da40a27-94a3-4624-98a7-4266a9b8e142.description: Today, I noticed a large pile of garbage illegally dumped in Park Momina Banya. The trash is scattered all over, creating an eyesore and posing a health hazard to visitors. This needs immediate attention to keep our park clean and safe for everyone.
8da40a27-94a3-4624-98a7-4266a9b8e142.author: pesho

329c2344-365f-4a24-b123-b25bb944906e.title: Public lighting problem
329c2344-365f-4a24-b123-b25bb944906e.description: I just noticed that the streetlight in front of my house is not working. The entire area is pitch dark, making it difficult and unsafe for pedestrians and drivers. This needs urgent attention to ensure the safety of the residents.
329c2344-365f-4a24-b123-b25bb944906e.author: ivan

e1c0d4ea-0d23-4e71-af62-97b4a45253ab.title: Flooding road
e1c0d4ea-0d23-4e71-af62-97b4a45253ab.description: Due to last night's storm, there's significant flooding on the road. The stormwater drain is blocked, causing water to accumulate over it. This situation needs urgent attention to prevent further disruption and ensure safe passage for vehicles and pedestrians.
e1c0d4ea-0d23-4e71-af62-97b4a45253ab.author: tachkata

23285b09-855f-4bb4-a0af-d42648eb89ec.title: Broken bench
23285b09-855f-4bb4-a0af-d42648eb89ec.description: This morning, I noticed that a bench outside the stadium has been vandalized and is broken. The damage makes it unusable and creates an eyesore for the area. This needs to be repaired or replaced to maintain the appearance and functionality of the public space.
23285b09-855f-4bb4-a0af-d42648eb89ec.author: ivan

663c8231-1855-418d-ba40-cdea3e5663e8.title: Pipe problem
663c8231-1855-418d-ba40-cdea3e5663e8.description: I just noticed significant flooding on the road in front of the Gallery Hotel due to an underground pipe problem. This needs urgent attention to prevent further disruption and potential damage.
663c8231-1855-418d-ba40-cdea3e5663e8.author: alonso

a4948e93-e8e8-4a5d-a2cc-3917c4b0b8c3.title: Lost dog
a4948e93-e8e8-4a5d-a2cc-3917c4b0b8c3.description: This afternoon, I found a lost puppy with a strap wandering around. It's clear that the puppy has an owner who might be looking for it. If this is your puppy, please contact me at 0882461831 to arrange for its return.
a4948e93-e8e8-4a5d-a2cc-3917c4b0b8c3.author: dayana

2745b7a2-b52d-4d24-b4ee-69a12f67a4e6.title: Overloaded bins
2745b7a2-b52d-4d24-b4ee-69a12f67a4e6.description: The public bins at Hotel Hissar are overloaded, causing trash to spill onto the road. Stray dogs are spreading the garbage everywhere, creating a mess and a potential health hazard. This situation needs immediate attention to keep the area clean and safe.
2745b7a2-b52d-4d24-b4ee-69a12f67a4e6.author: ivan

0713a44e-9d2a-473d-a680-7820e468d236.title: Huge crater
0713a44e-9d2a-473d-a680-7820e468d236.description: There is a very big hole on Vasil Levski Street that needs urgent road maintenance. The hole poses a significant danger to drivers and it needs to be repaired as soon as possible to ensure safety.
0713a44e-9d2a-473d-a680-7820e468d236.author: tachkata

6f349bf6-a927-489f-8fdf-6296aee76b65.title: Lost keys
6f349bf6-a927-489f-8fdf-6296aee76b65.description: This evening, I found a set of keys left on the bench in front of the community center. They seem to have been forgotten by someone, and Iâ€™m concerned the owner might be looking for them. If these are your keys, please contact me at 0873489212 to arrange for their return.
6f349bf6-a927-489f-8fdf-6296aee76b65.location: In front of the Community center
6f349bf6-a927-489f-8fdf-6296aee76b65.author: pepa
